text.section: A tax is imposed on each motor carrier who operates or causes the operation of a commercial motor vehicle on a highway in this State.

The tax under this section is imposed whether the commercial motor vehicle is:
owned by or leased to the motor carrier;
operated loaded or empty; or
operated for compensation or for no compensation.
